Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: He then presented to the emergency department feeling quite ill and was found to have a blood urea nitrogen ( BUN ) concentration of of 147 mg / dl , creatinine of 15 . 3 mg / dl and serum potassium of 8 . 7 mEq / l .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| quite ill |

Even though "quite ill" is not a specific disease, it is the reason for the patient seeking medical attention, so I included it as a disease entity. The other conditions mentioned in the paragraph are not diseases but rather lab results.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
